author: Catherine McGrath
title: Anthony Pompliano strikes deal to create publicly-traded Bitcoin treasury company
description: The company will spend up to $1 billion to establish a Bitcoin treasury.
content:
Crypto investor and financial influencer Anthony Pomplianos Bitcoin-native financial service company has made plans to go public via a special-purpose acquisition company (SPAC).
